Does the client have insurance coverage?
If DOB is unknown, enter the client's age. Note displaying the client's age in years.
Whether client wants to receive text or other messages as follow-up for family planning
Indication that client gave consent to be contacted
How the client was referred

name.value: Miscarriage or abortion stage of pregnancy

description.value: If the woman recently had a miscarriage or abortion, when in the pregnancy the abortion took place.
The highest level of school the client has reached.
For a postpartum woman, the amount of time since she delivered.
Write in the medication not included in the list.
The client's height in centimetres.
Method the client reports currently using at intake.
Temperature of the client in Celsius
Contraceptive methods the client has a history of using
First day of last normal menses.
The client's current weight in kilograms.
Date of last implant if currently using the method.
Body mass index (BMI) is calculated by taking weight in kg divided by the squared height in meters, i.e., kg/m^2.
Reported use of method at intake
Gender-based violence risk factors relevant to the population.
If the client has been sexually active
Reported use of method at intake
Whether or not the client is sexually active.
If the client has never previously used any modern method of contraception.
WHO HIV clinical stage
HIV status of client or not known.
Finding of human immunodeficiency virus status
Unprotected sexual intercourse
STI risk factors relevant to the population (e.g., sexually active, new partner in the past three months, partner has an STI, etc.)
Any known medical allergies of the client.

name.value: WHO-Core Observation (Reason for no contraceptive method at intake)

description.value: If not currently using a method, the reason why.
How the client was referred
Pregnancy status at visit
Select if a woman is currently breastfeeding.
Contraceptive methods the client has a history of using
Days since unprotected sex
The provider that served the client.
Date of sterilization, if not reversed.
The number of pregnancies (gravidity), current and past, regardless of pregnancy outcome.
Method the client reports currently using at intake.
The number of pregnancies reaching parity.
History of exposure to gender-based violence
Any known medical allergies of the client.
Whether client delivered in the past 6 weeks.
For a postpartum woman, the date she recently delivered.
The date and time of the client's visit
A follow up outreach to the client is recommended
Date and time of return visit appointment
Observations made during an exam or visit.
